title: Riot please try to fix the VO data folder
body: I have play TW and China server they are allow to change in game Champions VO like Japanese VO or other language, is just VO change won't ruin the game so please Riot try to fix the VO folder don't make it like 0.0.0.73 <<<< and make it hard to change anything. Because in other server like TW server and China server they just put all the things in a folder called data>sounds>Wwise>VO>en_US>and two folder Champion and Shared and all you have to do is just copy and paste the Language pack VO in there and that's it and the players are happy and also increase the game experience! So please Riot FIX this we really like the Japanese sound effect! Do it for us please FIX! Riot I really do like your server so please Fix this for our gamer. Hopefully I get good news soon!

replies.body:
Hey dude,

The TW and China server are run by garena and qq respectively,  they handle things differently than Riot, however it is still very easy to change the VO's on the western clients.

Take a look at [LVOC](http://lexwah.com/lvoc/) a handy little tool developed to change the league clients language/VO's easily, however at the current moment you are not able to use the Japanese VO's, see this note from the developer.

>When Riot releases the voice packs (so, when the Japanese server is ready), LVOC will support changing to Japanese. Currently, no one but Riot knows when this will be, however I've also been highly anticipating the Japanese voices, so you can expect the software to be updated around the same day.

**NOTE: as with any other method of tampering with the game files, this can potentially break your game/launcher. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK**

Thanks bro, but I really want Riot can change they folder. I have the JP language VO pack if the LVOC development wan't it I can share it to them and let them update the VO tools. Because the JP VO is really awesome it work well in TW and CN server.
